subject: Simsonn manager 2.1.3
description_text:
Hi support,

I just tried to instal your new version 2.1.3 on windows 11. It won’t install at all . It will just hang there and I have to force close the setup. No matter how many times i try it fails.
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi FAibS Yoooooo,  Please try uninstalling the old version from your PC first, then download and install version 2.1.3. If you encounter any issues during installation, feel free to send me a screenshot and I’ll help check it. Alternatively, you can download the ZIP version, which can be used directly after extraction without installation.
